item.description:
Spring is around the corner! Meeting hotties doesn't get any easier than this. You get 4 minutes with a bunch of different singles, we provide conversation topics to get you started and a painless way at the end of the evening to tell the cuties you liked that, well, that you like 'em. Better than that, you'll support the Boston Dyke March!

First come, first serve. Seats fill up fast, so get in line before 7:00 pm. Cost is $10. Cost is $10. Proceeds go towards putting on the Boston Dyke March. Check out Boston Dyke March.com.

This event is proudly co-sponsored with MadFemmePride! Check out mFp's website.

Thanks to Kristen Porter's Dyke Night. Check out Dyke Night's website.
item.why: Speed dating is a fun, relaxing way to meet new people.

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: Butch / Femme Speed Dating and Those Who Date Them
